name: Shell Template - Windows 10 & 10 X
description:
A template based off the shell used in Windows 10 and 10X. All made from scratch in Figma!


This file includes:

  • Taskbars (both Windows 10 and 10X)
  • Jump Lists
  • Start Menus (Windows 10 and 10X)
  • Action Centers (Windows 10 and 10X)
  • 11 Notification Styles
  • Dark modes and rounded varients of the components mentioned above


Feel free to use it in your projects and stuff. Attribution is not neccesory. But if you want to give it, it will really be appreciated :)


(Shameless Plug) I post Windows design-related content on my Twitter. A follow would really be appreciated! üòÅ
